channel.title: CVE Feed for Combodo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Combodo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41245|2024-08-04T03:08:31.546Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In versions prior to 2.7.6 and 3.0.0, CSRF tokens generated by `privUITransactionFile` aren't properly checked. Versions 2.7.6 and 3.0.0 contain a patch for this issue. As a workaround, use the session implementation by adding in the iTop config file.

item.title: CVE-2020-12780|2024-08-04T12:04:22.887Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: A security misconfiguration exists in Combodo iTop, which can expose sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2020-12781|2024-08-04T12:04:22.896Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, attackers can execute specific commands via malicious site request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2020-12777|2024-08-04T12:04:22.895Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: A function in Combodo iTop contains a vulnerability of Broken Access Control, which allows unauthorized attacker to inject command and disclose system information.

item.title: CVE-2020-15219|2024-08-04T13:08:22.809Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In iTop before versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0, when a download error is triggered in the user portal, an SQL query is displayed to the user. This is fixed in versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2020-4079|2024-08-04T07:52:20.880Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In iTop before versions 2.7.2 and 2.8.0, when the ajax endpoint for the "excel export" portal functionality is called directly it allows getting data without scope filtering. This allows a user to access data they which they should not have access to. This is fixed in versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2020-12779|2024-08-04T12:04:22.867Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop contains a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability, which can be attacked by uploading file with malicious script.

item.title: CVE-2020-15220|2024-08-04T13:08:22.815Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In iTop before versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0, two cookies are created for the same session, which leads to a possibility to steal user session. This is fixed in versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2021-41161|2024-08-04T02:59:31.699Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In versions prior to 3.0.0-beta6 the export CSV page don't properly escape the user supplied parameters, allowing for javascript injection into rendered csv files. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2021-41162|2024-08-04T02:59:31.649Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In 3.0.0 beta releases prior to beta6 the `ajax.render.php?operation=wizard_helper` page did not properly escape the user supplied parameters, allowing for a cross site scripting attack vector. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2020-12778|2024-08-04T12:04:22.890Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop does not validate inputted parameters, attackers can inject malicious commands and launch XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2020-15221|2024-08-04T13:08:23.137Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In iTop before versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0, by modifying target browser local storage, an XSS can be generated in the iTop console breadcrumb. This is fixed in versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2020-15218|2024-08-04T13:08:22.897Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: Combodo iTop is a web based IT Service Management tool. In iTop before versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0, admin pages are cached, so that their content is visible after deconnection by using the browser back button. This is fixed in versions 2.7.2 and 3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-48709|2024-08-02T21:37:54.693Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When exporting data from backoffice or portal in CSV or Excel files, users' inputs may include malicious formulas that may be imported into Excel. As Excel 2016 does **not** prevent Remote Code Execution by default, uninformed users may become victims. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.7.9, 3.0.4, 3.1.1, and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47626|2024-08-02T21:16:42.094Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When displaying/editing the user's personal tokens, XSS attacks are possible. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47622|2024-08-02T21:16:42.196Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When dashlet are refreshed, XSS attacks are possible. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.0.4 and 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-48710|2024-08-02T21:37:54.644Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. Files from the `env-production` folder can be retrieved even though they should have restricted access. Hopefully, there is no sensitive files stored in that folder natively, but there could be from a third-party module. The `pages/exec.php` script as been fixed to limit execution of PHP files only. Other file types won't be retrieved and exposed. The vulnerability is fixed in 2.7.10, 3.0.4, 3.1.1, and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-43790|2024-08-02T19:52:11.363Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. By manipulating HTTP queries, a user can inject malicious content in the fields used for the object friendlyname value. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1 and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-38511|2024-08-02T17:46:56.635Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. Dashboard editor : can load multiple files and URL, and full path disclosure on dashboard config file. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.0.4 and 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-48710|2024-07-26T19:06:04.001Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. Files from the `env-production` folder can be retrieved even though they should have restricted access. Hopefully, there is no sensitive files stored in that folder natively, but there could be from a third-party module. The `pages/exec.php` script as been fixed to limit execution of PHP files only. Other file types won't be retrieved and exposed. The vulnerability is fixed in 2.7.10, 3.0.4, 3.1.1, and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-43790|2024-07-10T16:36:12.279Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. By manipulating HTTP queries, a user can inject malicious content in the fields used for the object friendlyname value. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1 and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-48709|2024-06-17T20:05:33.014Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When exporting data from backoffice or portal in CSV or Excel files, users' inputs may include malicious formulas that may be imported into Excel. As Excel 2016 does **not** prevent Remote Code Execution by default, uninformed users may become victims. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.7.9, 3.0.4, 3.1.1, and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-44396|2024-04-15T17:13:45.144Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. Dashlet edits ajax endpoints can be used to produce XSS. Fixed in iTop 2.7.10, 3.0.4, and 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-45808|2024-06-04T17:19:57.785Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When creating or updating an object, extkey values aren't checked to be in the current user silo. In other words, by forging an http request, the user can create objects pointing to out of silo objects (for example a UserRequest in an out of scope Organization). Fixed in iTop 2.7.10, 3.0.4, 3.1.1, and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-43790|2024-04-15T17:10:39.144Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. By manipulating HTTP queries, a user can inject malicious content in the fields used for the object friendlyname value. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1 and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47622|2024-06-04T17:26:35.184Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When dashlet are refreshed, XSS attacks are possible. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.0.4 and 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-47123|2024-06-04T17:26:44.001Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. By filling malicious code in an object friendlyname / complementary name, an XSS attack can be performed when this object will displayed as an n:n relation item in another object. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1 and 3.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-47626|2024-04-15T17:36:08.437Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When displaying/editing the user's personal tokens, XSS attacks are possible. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1.

When exporting data from backoffice or portal in CSV or Excel files, users' inputs may include malicious formulas that may be imported into Excel. item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. When displaying/editing the user's personal tokens, XSS attacks are possible. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.1.1.
